function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of digital twin technology in healthcare for remote monitoring and treatment","Impact":"Potential privacy and security risks of patient data being collected and transmitted","Mitigation":"Implementing robust data encryption and access control measures, ensuring compliance with healthcare data regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data transmission protocols, access control mechanisms","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and IT professionals"},{"Description":"Use of digital twin technology in manufacturing for decision support","Impact":"Dependency on accurate data integration and validation for effective decision-making","Mitigation":"Implementing quality control measures for data collection and integration, conducting regular validation and calibration of digital twin models","Technologies":"Quality control systems, validation and calibration tools, data integration platforms","People":"Manufacturing companies, data analysts, quality control teams","Owner":"Manufacturing companies, data analysts"}]}
